storm.supervisor.slotsUsed.name: storm.supervisor.slotsUsed
storm.supervisor.slotsUsed.definition: Number of worker slots used on this supervisor

storm.supervisor.usedCpu.name: storm.supervisor.usedCpu
storm.supervisor.usedCpu.definition: Used CPU capacity on this supervisor

storm.supervisor.usedMem.name: storm.supervisor.usedMem
storm.supervisor.usedMem.definition: Used memory capacity on this supervisor

storm.cluster.slotsTotal.name: storm.cluster.slotsTotal
storm.cluster.slotsTotal.definition: Total number of available worker slots

storm.supervisor.slotsTotal.name: storm.supervisor.slotsTotal
storm.supervisor.slotsTotal.definition: Total number of available worker slots for this supervisor

storm.supervisor.totalCpu.name: storm.supervisor.totalCpu
storm.supervisor.totalCpu.definition: Total CPU capacity on this supervisor

storm.supervisor.totalMem.name: storm.supervisor.totalMem
storm.supervisor.totalMem.definition: Total memory capacity on this supervisor

storm.supervisor.uptimeSeconds.name: storm.supervisor.uptimeSeconds
storm.supervisor.uptimeSeconds.definition: Shows how long the supervisor is running in seconds

storm.topology.executorsTotal.name: storm.topology.executorsTotal
storm.topology.executorsTotal.definition: Number of executors used for this topology

storm.topology.replicationCount.name: storm.topology.replicationCount
storm.topology.replicationCount.definition: Number of nimbus hosts on which this topology code is replicated

storm.topology.tasksTotal.name: storm.topology.tasksTotal
storm.topology.tasksTotal.definition: Total number of tasks for this topology

storm.topology.uptimeSeconds.name: storm.topology.uptimeSeconds
storm.topology.uptimeSeconds.definition: Shows how long the topology is running in seconds

storm.topology.workersTotal.name: storm.topology.workersTotal
storm.topology.workersTotal.definition: Number of workers used for this topology
